Question: Shenzhen Ginto E-Commerce Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Ginto E-Commerce Co., Ltd.

Wireless Bluetooth Headphones

- Outstanding sound quality and ergonomic design
- Sold in more than 30 countries, reaching over 20 million music lovers
- Products undergo at least 29 production processes, over 800 quality inspections, and 200 professional tunings
- Cooperation with a modernized factory covering an area of over 5000 square meters, 40 production lines, and nearly 1000 employees
- All products are carefully designed with strict standards, from appearance to structural design, acoustic assembly design, tuning, and engineering prototype production
